plot: Uncle Pete is a faithful slave who helps his master escape by convincing the Yankees he has died of smallpox.
title: Uncle Pete's Ruse
plot_es: Uncle Pete is a faithful slave who helps his master escape by convincing the Yankees he has died of smallpox.
plot_en: Uncle Pete is a faithful slave who helps his master escape by convincing the Yankees he has died of smallpox.

produce.name: Independent Moving Pictures Co. of America (IMP)
